author: iSazonov
body:
Related #3565 and #4357.

Now `System.Transactions` is in CoreFX 2.0 but all transaction cmdlets is only in FullCLR and we haven't tests at all.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
From @daxian-dbw 
>Let's keep the transaction related if/defs for now. More work is needed to enable transaction support.

title: Clean up '#if CORE' in Attributes.cs
